mlx.nn.LeakyReLU
****************

class LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)

   Applies the Leaky Rectified Linear Unit.

   Simply "mx.maximum(negative_slope * x, x)".

   Parameters:
      **negative_slope** -- Controls the angle of the negative slope.
      Default: "1e-2"

   -[ Methods ]-

   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
